scheme_name: Scheme of Fund for Regeneration of Traditional Industries
description: The Scheme of Fund for Regeneration of Traditional Industries (SFURTI) supports the development of traditional industry clusters, including agro-based industries, to enhance employment and income.

benefits.financial_support: Up to Rs. 2.5 crore per cluster

criteria: NGOs, cooperatives, and institutions supporting clusters

special_notes: Focus on agro-based and artisanal products
